```diff
+ import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
+ import { requireAdmin } from '@/lib/auth/roles';
+ 
+ export async function GET(request: NextRequest) {
+   try {
+     // Verificar permisos de administrador
+     const { authorized, error } = requireAdmin(request);
+     if (!authorized) return error;
+ 
+     const searchParams = request.nextUrl.searchParams;
+     const categoryId = searchParams.get('categoryId');
+     const search = searchParams.get('search') || '';
+     const activeOnly = searchParams.get('activeOnly') === 'true';
+ 
+     // Build where clause
+     // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any
+     const where: Record&lt;string, any&gt; = {
+       deleted_at: null,
+     };
+ 
+     if (search) {
+       where.OR = [
+         { code: { contains: search, mode: 'insensitive' } },
+         { description: { contains: search, mode: 'insensitive' } },
+       ];
+     }
+ 
+     if (categoryId) {
+       where.category_id = BigInt(categoryId);
+     }
+ 
+     if (activeOnly) {
+       where.is_active = true;
+     }
+ 
+     // Fetch all articles with their categories
+     const articles = await prisma.articles.findMany({
+       where,
+       include: {
+         categories: true,
+       },
+       orderBy: [
+         { categories: { name: 'asc' } },
+         { display_order: 'asc' },
+         { code: 'asc' },
+       ],
+     });
+ 
+     // Group articles by category
+     const categoryMap = new Map&lt;string, {
+       categoryId: number;
+       categoryName: string;
+       categoryCode: string;
+       items: Array&lt;{
+         id: number;
+         code: string;
+         description: string;
+         unitPrice: number;
+         categoryId: number;
+         categoryName: string;
+         isActive: boolean;
+         isDiscontinued: boolean;
+       }&gt;;
+     }&gt;();
+ 
+     articles.forEach((article) =&gt; {
+       const categoryKey = article.category_id.toString();
+       
+       if (!categoryMap.has(categoryKey)) {
+         categoryMap.set(categoryKey, {
+           categoryId: Number(article.category_id),
+           categoryName: article.categories.name,
+           categoryCode: article.categories.code,
+           items: [],
+         });
+       }
+ 
+       const category = categoryMap.get(categoryKey)!;
+       category.items.push({
+         id: Number(article.id),
+         code: article.code,
+         description: article.description,
+         unitPrice: Number(article.unit_price),
+         categoryId: Number(article.category_id),
+         categoryName: article.categories.name,
+         isActive: article.is_active,
+         isDiscontinued: article.is_discontinued,
+       });
+     });
+ 
+     // Convert map to array and add totalItems
+     const data = Array.from(categoryMap.values()).map(category =&gt; ({
+       ...category,
+       totalItems: category.items.length,
+     }));
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({
+       data,
+       totalArticles: articles.length,
+       totalCategories: data.length,
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error fetching price lists:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to fetch price lists' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+
```

```diff
+ import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
+ import { requireAdmin } from '@/lib/auth/roles';
+ import { z } from 'zod';
+ import { OPERATIONS } from '@/lib/constants/operations';
+ import { logActivity } from '@/lib/services/activityLogger';
+ import { ChangeTracker } from '@/lib/services/changeTracker';
+ 
+ // Schema de validaci√≥n para actualizaciones masivas
+ const bulkPriceUpdateSchema = z.object({
+   updates: z.array(z.object({
+     articleId: z.number(),
+     newPrice: z.number().min(0, 'El precio debe ser mayor o igual a 0'),
+   })).min(1, 'Debe haber al menos una actualizaci√≥n'),
+ });
+ 
+ export async function PUT(request: NextRequest) {
+   try {
+     // Verificar permisos de administrador
+     const { authorized, error, user } = requireAdmin(request);
+     if (!authorized) return error;
+ 
+     const body = await request.json();
+     
+     // Validar datos de entrada
+     const validatedData = bulkPriceUpdateSchema.parse(body);
+ 
+     // Iniciar tracker de cambios
+     const tracker = new ChangeTracker();
+     
+     // Actualizar cada art√≠culo
+     const updatedArticles = [];
+     
+     for (const update of validatedData.updates) {
+       // Obtener art√≠culo actual para el log
+       const currentArticle = await prisma.articles.findUnique({
+         where: { id: BigInt(update.articleId) },
+         include: { categories: true },
+       });
+ 
+       if (!currentArticle || currentArticle.deleted_at) {
+         continue; // Skip deleted or non-existent articles
+       }
+ 
+       // Guardar estado anterior para tracking
+       const beforeState = {
+         id: Number(currentArticle.id),
+         code: currentArticle.code,
+         description: currentArticle.description,
+         unit_price: Number(currentArticle.unit_price),
+       };
+ 
+       // Actualizar el precio
+       const updatedArticle = await prisma.articles.update({
+         where: { id: BigInt(update.articleId) },
+         data: {
+           unit_price: update.newPrice,
+           updated_at: new Date(),
+         },
+         include: { categories: true },
+       });
+ 
+       // Guardar estado posterior para tracking
+       const afterState = {
+         id: Number(updatedArticle.id),
+         code: updatedArticle.code,
+         description: updatedArticle.description,
+         unit_price: Number(updatedArticle.unit_price),
+       };
+ 
+       // Trackear cambio
+       tracker.trackUpdate(
+         'article',
+         updatedArticle.id,
+         beforeState,
+         afterState,
+         &#96;${updatedArticle.code} - ${updatedArticle.description}&#96;
+       );
+ 
+       updatedArticles.push({
+         id: Number(updatedArticle.id),
+         code: updatedArticle.code,
+         description: updatedArticle.description,
+         unitPrice: Number(updatedArticle.unit_price),
+         categoryName: updatedArticle.categories.name,
+       });
+     }
+ 
+     // Registrar actividad
+     const activityLogId = await logActivity({
+       request,
+       operation: OPERATIONS.PRICE_BULK_UPDATE,
+       description: &#96;Actualizaci√≥n masiva de ${updatedArticles.length} precios&#96;,
+       entityType: 'price-list',
+       entityId: null,
+       details: {
+         updatedCount: updatedArticles.length,
+         totalRequested: validatedData.updates.length,
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     // Guardar cambios detallados
+     if (activityLogId) {
+       await tracker.saveChanges(activityLogId);
+     }
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({
+       success: true,
+       updatedCount: updatedArticles.length,
+       articles: updatedArticles,
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error updating prices:', error);
+ 
+     if (error instanceof z.ZodError) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Validation error', details: error.issues },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to update prices' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+
```

```diff
+ import { API_CONFIG } from '@/lib/config';
+ import { PriceListResponse, PriceListFilters, BulkPriceUpdate } from '@/types/priceList';
+ 
+ export async function fetchPriceLists(filters?: PriceListFilters): Promise&lt;PriceListResponse&gt; {
+   const params = new URLSearchParams();
+   
+   if (filters?.categoryId) {
+     params.append('categoryId', filters.categoryId.toString());
+   }
+   
+   if (filters?.search) {
+     params.append('search', filters.search);
+   }
+   
+   if (filters?.activeOnly !== undefined) {
+     params.append('activeOnly', filters.activeOnly.toString());
+   }
+ 
+   const response = await fetch(&#96;${API_CONFIG.baseUrl}/price-lists?${params.toString()}&#96;, {
+     method: 'GET',
+     headers: {
+       'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+     },
+     credentials: 'include',
+   });
+ 
+   if (!response.ok) {
+     const error = await response.json().catch(() =&gt; ({ error: 'Failed to fetch price lists' }));
+     throw new Error(error.error || 'Failed to fetch price lists');
+   }
+ 
+   return response.json();
+ }
+ 
+ export async function updatePrices(updates: BulkPriceUpdate[]): Promise&lt;{
+   success: boolean;
+   updatedCount: number;
+   articles: Array&lt;{
+     id: number;

+     description: string;
+     unitPrice: number;
+     categoryName: string;

+   const response = await fetch(&#96;${API_CONFIG.baseUrl}/price-lists/bulk-update&#96;, {
+     method: 'PUT',
+     headers: {
+       'Content-Type': 'application/json',

+     credentials: 'include',
+     body: JSON.stringify({ updates }),

+   if (!response.ok) {
+     const error = await response.json().catch(() =&gt; ({ error: 'Failed to update prices' }));

+   return response.json();
```

```diff
+ import { useQuery, useMutation, useQueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query';
+ import { fetchPriceLists, updatePrices } from '@/lib/api/priceList';
+ import { PriceListFilters, BulkPriceUpdate } from '@/types/priceList';
+ import { toast } from 'sonner';
+ 
+ export function usePriceLists(filters?: PriceListFilters) {
+   return useQuery({
+     queryKey: ['price-lists', filters],
+     queryFn: () =&gt; fetchPriceLists(filters),
+     staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes
+   });
+ }
+ 
+ export function useUpdatePrices() {
+   const queryClient = useQueryClient();
+ 
+   return useMutation({
+     mutationFn: (updates: BulkPriceUpdate[]) =&gt; updatePrices(updates),
+     onSuccess: (data) =&gt; {
+       // Invalidar cache de price-lists
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['price-lists'] });
+       
+       // Tambi√©n invalidar art√≠culos ya que cambiaron los precios
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['articles'] });
+       
+       toast.success(&#96;${data.updatedCount} precios actualizados correctamente&#96;);
+     },
+     onError: (error: Error) =&gt; {
+       toast.error(error.message || 'Error al actualizar precios');
+     },
+   });
+ }
+
```

```typescript
'use client';

import { useState } from 'react';
import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogDescription, DialogHeader, DialogTitle } from '@/components/ui/dialog';
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
import { Label } from '@/components/ui/label';
import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow } from '@/components/ui/table';
import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
import { Alert, AlertDescription } from '@/components/ui/alert';
import { Upload, AlertCircle, TrendingUp, TrendingDown } from 'lucide-react';
import { toast } from 'sonner';

interface ImportPreviewItem {
  code: string;
  articleId?: number;
  description?: string;
  currentPrice?: number;
  costPrice?: number;
  newPrice: number;
  adjustedPrice: number;
  margin?: number;
  status: 'found' | 'not-found' | 'no-cost';
}

interface PriceImportDialogProps {
  open: boolean;
  onOpenChange: (open: boolean) => void;
  onConfirm: (updates: Array<{ articleId: number; newPrice: number }>) => void;
  articles: Array<{
    id: number;
    code: string;
    description: string;
    unitPrice: number;
    costPrice?: number;
  }>;
}

export function PriceImportDialog({ open, onOpenChange, onConfirm, articles }: PriceImportDialogProps) {
  const [csvData, setCsvData] = useState<ImportPreviewItem[]>([]);
  const [discountPercent, setDiscountPercent] = useState<number>(0);
  const [isProcessing, setIsProcessing] = useState(false);

  const handleFileUpload = (event: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    const file = event.target.files?.[0];
    if (!file) return;

    const reader = new FileReader();
    reader.onload = (e) => {
      try {
        const text = e.target?.result as string;
        const lines = text.split('\n').filter(line => line.trim());
        
        if (lines.length < 2) {
          toast.error('El archivo CSV est√° vac√≠o o no tiene datos');
          return;
        }

        // Skip header
        const dataLines = lines.slice(1);
        
        const parsed: ImportPreviewItem[] = dataLines.map(line => {
          const [code, priceStr] = line.split(',').map(s => s.trim());
          const newPrice = parseFloat(priceStr);
          
          if (!code || isNaN(newPrice)) {
            return null;
          }

          // Buscar art√≠culo por c√≥digo
          const article = articles.find(a => a.code.toUpperCase() === code.toUpperCase());
          
          if (!article) {
            return {
              code,
              newPrice,
              adjustedPrice: newPrice,
              status: 'not-found' as const,
            };
          }

          const hasCost = article.costPrice && article.costPrice > 0;
          const margin = hasCost 
            ? ((newPrice - article.costPrice!) / newPrice) * 100 
            : undefined;

          return {
            code,
            articleId: article.id,
            description: article.description,
            currentPrice: article.unitPrice,
            costPrice: article.costPrice,
            newPrice,
            adjustedPrice: newPrice,
            margin,
            status: hasCost ? 'found' as const : 'no-cost' as const,
          };
        }).filter(Boolean) as ImportPreviewItem[];

        setCsvData(parsed);
        toast.success(`${parsed.length} precios cargados del CSV`);
      } catch (error) {
        toast.error('Error al procesar el archivo CSV');
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    reader.readAsText(file);
  };

  const handleDiscountChange = (value: string) => {
    const discount = parseFloat(value) || 0;
    setDiscountPercent(discount);
    
    // Recalcular precios ajustados y m√°rgenes
    setCsvData(prev => prev.map(item => {
      const adjustedPrice = item.newPrice * (1 - discount / 100);
      const margin = item.costPrice && item.costPrice > 0
        ? ((adjustedPrice - item.costPrice) / adjustedPrice) * 100
        : undefined;
      
      return {
        ...item,
        adjustedPrice,
        margin,
      };
    }));
  };

  const handleConfirm = async () => {
    const validUpdates = csvData
      .filter(item => item.status === 'found' || item.status === 'no-cost')
      .filter(item => item.articleId)
      .map(item => ({
        articleId: item.articleId!,
        newPrice: item.adjustedPrice,
      }));

    if (validUpdates.length === 0) {
      toast.error('No hay precios v√°lidos para actualizar');
      return;
    }

    setIsProcessing(true);
    try {
      await onConfirm(validUpdates);
      onOpenChange(false);
      setCsvData([]);
      setDiscountPercent(0);
    } catch (error) {
      // Error ya manejado por el mutation
    } finally {
      setIsProcessing(false);
    }
  };

  const stats = {
    total: csvData.length,
    found: csvData.filter(i => i.status === 'found' || i.status === 'no-cost').length,
    notFound: csvData.filter(i => i.status === 'not-found').length,
    noCost: csvData.filter(i => i.status === 'no-cost').length,
    avgMargin: csvData
      .filter(i => i.margin !== undefined)
      .reduce((sum, i) => sum + i.margin!, 0) / csvData.filter(i => i.margin !== undefined).length || 0,
  };

  return (
    <Dialog open={open} onOpenChange={onOpenChange}>
      <DialogContent className="max-w-6xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-hidden flex flex-col">
        <DialogHeader>
          <DialogTitle>Importar Precios desde CSV</DialogTitle>
          <DialogDescription>
            Sube un archivo CSV con las columnas: Codigo, NuevoDB
          </DialogDescription>
        </DialogHeader>

        <div className="space-y-4 flex-1 overflow-auto">
          {/* Upload Section */}
          {csvData.length === 0 ? (
            <div className="border-2 border-dashed rounded-lg p-8 text-center">
              <Upload className="h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 text-muted-foreground" />
              <Label htmlFor="csv-upload" className="cursor-pointer">
                <div className="text-sm text-muted-foreground mb-2">
                  Haz clic para seleccionar un archivo CSV
                </div>
                <Input
                  id="csv-upload"
                  type="file"
                  accept=".csv"
                  onChange={handleFileUpload}
                  className="hidden"
                />
                <Button variant="secondary" type="button">
                  Seleccionar Archivo
                </Button>
              </Label>
            </div>
          ) : (
            <>
              {/* Stats */}
              <div className="grid grid-cols-5 gap-4">
                <div className="bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-950 p-3 rounded-lg">
                  <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Total</div>
                  <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{stats.total}</div>
                </div>
                <div className="bg-green-50 dark:bg-green-950 p-3 rounded-lg">
                  <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Encontrados</div>
                  <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-green-600">{stats.found}</div>
                </div>
                <div className="bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-950 p-3 rounded-lg">
                  <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">No Encontrados</div>
                  <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-red-600">{stats.notFound}</div>
                </div>
                <div className="bg-yellow-50 dark:bg-yellow-950 p-3 rounded-lg">
                  <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Sin Costo</div>
                  <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-yellow-600">{stats.noCost}</div>
                </div>
                <div className="bg-purple-50 dark:bg-purple-950 p-3 rounded-lg">
                  <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground">Margen Promedio</div>
                  <div className="text-2xl font-bold text-purple-600">
                    {stats.avgMargin.toFixed(1)}%
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              {/* Discount Adjustment */}
              <div className="flex items-end gap-4">
                <div className="flex-1">
                  <Label htmlFor="discount">Ajuste de Descuento (%)</Label>
                  <Input
                    id="discount"
                    type="number"
                    step="0.1"
                    value={discountPercent}
                    onChange={(e) => handleDiscountChange(e.target.value)}
                    placeholder="0"
                  />
                </div>
                <Button variant="outline" onClick={() => handleDiscountChange('0')}>
                  Resetear
                </Button>
              </div>

              {discountPercent !== 0 && (
                <Alert>
                  <AlertCircle className="h-4 w-4" />
                  <AlertDescription>
                    Se aplicar√° un descuento del <strong>{discountPercent}%</strong> a todos los precios importados
                  </AlertDescription>
                </Alert>
              )}

              {/* Preview Table */}
              <div className="border rounded-lg overflow-auto max-h-96">
                <Table>
                  <TableHeader>
                    <TableRow>
                      <TableHead className="w-[120px]">C√≥digo</TableHead>
                      <TableHead>Descripci√≥n</TableHead>
                      <TableHead className="text-right">Precio Actual</TableHead>
                      <TableHead className="text-right">Precio CSV</TableHead>
                      <TableHead className="text-right">Precio Final</TableHead>
                      <TableHead className="text-right">Costo</TableHead>
                      <TableHead className="text-right">Margen</TableHead>
                      <TableHead>Estado</TableHead>
                    </TableRow>
                  </TableHeader>
                  <TableBody>
                    {csvData.map((item, idx) => (
                      <TableRow key={idx}>
                        <TableCell className="font-mono text-sm">{item.code}</TableCell>
                        <TableCell className="text-sm">
                          {item.description || <span className="text-muted-foreground">-</span>}
                        </TableCell>
                        <TableCell className="text-right">
                          {item.currentPrice ? `$${item.currentPrice.toFixed(2)}` : '-'}
                        </TableCell>
                        <TableCell className="text-right font-medium">
                          ${item.newPrice.toFixed(2)}
                        </TableCell>
                        <TableCell className="text-right font-bold text-primary">
                          ${item.adjustedPrice.toFixed(2)}
                        </TableCell>
                        <TableCell className="text-right">
                          {item.costPrice ? `$${item.costPrice.toFixed(2)}` : '-'}
                        </TableCell>
                        <TableCell className="text-right">
                          {item.margin !== undefined ? (
                            <div className="flex items-center justify-end gap-1">
                              {item.margin >= 30 ? (
                                <TrendingUp className="h-4 w-4 text-green-600" />
                              ) : item.margin >= 15 ? (
                                <TrendingUp className="h-4 w-4 text-yellow-600" />
                              ) : (
                                <TrendingDown className="h-4 w-4 text-red-600" />
                              )}
                              <span className={
                                item.margin >= 30 ? 'text-green-600' :
                                item.margin >= 15 ? 'text-yellow-600' : 'text-red-600'
                              }>
                                {item.margin.toFixed(1)}%
                              </span>
                            </div>
                          ) : (
                            '-'
                          )}
                        </TableCell>
                        <TableCell>
                          <Badge variant={
                            item.status === 'found' ? 'default' :
                            item.status === 'no-cost' ? 'secondary' : 'destructive'
                          }>
                            {item.status === 'found' ? 'OK' :
                             item.status === 'no-cost' ? 'Sin Costo' : 'No Encontrado'}
                          </Badge>
                        </TableCell>
                      </TableRow>
                    ))}
                  </TableBody>
                </Table>
              </div>

              {/* Actions */}
              <div className="flex justify-between pt-4 border-t">
                <Button
                  variant="outline"
                  onClick={() => {
                    setCsvData([]);
                    setDiscountPercent(0);
                  }}
                >
                  Cancelar y Cargar Otro
                </Button>
                <div className="flex gap-2">
                  <Button variant="outline" onClick={() => onOpenChange(false)}>
                    Cerrar
                  </Button>
                  <Button
                    onClick={handleConfirm}
                    disabled={stats.found === 0 || isProcessing}
                  >
                    {isProcessing ? 'Actualizando...' : `Confirmar ${stats.found} Cambios`}
                  </Button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </>
          )}
        </div>
      </DialogContent>
    </Dialog>
  );
}
```

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ API para Historial de Precios

**Crear `frontend/app/api/price-history/route.ts`:**

```typescript
import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
import { requireAdmin } from '@/lib/auth/roles';

export async function GET(request: NextRequest) {
  try {
    const { authorized, error } = requireAdmin(request);
    if (!authorized) return error;

    const searchParams = request.nextUrl.searchParams;
    const page = parseInt(searchParams.get('page') || '1');
    const limit = parseInt(searchParams.get('limit') || '50');
    const articleId = searchParams.get('articleId');
    const categoryId = searchParams.get('categoryId');
    const changeType = searchParams.get('changeType');
    const startDate = searchParams.get('startDate');
    const endDate = searchParams.get('endDate');

    const skip = (page - 1) * limit;

    // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any
    const where: Record<string, any> = {};

    if (articleId) {
      where.article_id = BigInt(articleId);
    }

    if (changeType) {
      where.change_type = changeType;
    }

    if (startDate || endDate) {
      where.created_at = {};
      if (startDate) {
        where.created_at.gte = new Date(startDate);
      }
      if (endDate) {
        where.created_at.lte = new Date(endDate);
      }
    }

    // Si hay filtro por categor√≠a, necesitamos join con articles
    if (categoryId) {
      where.articles = {
        category_id: BigInt(categoryId),
        deleted_at: null,
      };
    }

    const [history, total] = await Promise.all([
      prisma.price_history.findMany({
        where,
        include: {
          articles: {
            select: {
              id: true,
              code: true,
              description: true,
              category_id: true,
            },
          },
        },
        orderBy: {
          created_at: 'desc',
        },
        skip,
        take: limit,
      }),
      prisma.price_history.count({ where }),
    ]);

    const data = history.map(h => ({
      id: Number(h.id),
      articleId: Number(h.article_id),
      articleCode: h.articles.code,
      articleDescription: h.articles.description,
      oldPrice: Number(h.old_price),
      newPrice: Number(h.new_price),
      changeType: h.change_type,
      changedBy: h.changed_by || undefined,
      changedByName: h.changed_by_name || undefined,
      notes: h.notes || undefined,
      createdAt: h.created_at.toISOString(),
      priceChange: Number(h.new_price) - Number(h.old_price),
      priceChangePercent: ((Number(h.new_price) - Number(h.old_price)) / Number(h.old_price)) * 100,
    }));

    return NextResponse.json({
      data,
      pagination: {
        page,
        limit,
        total,
        totalPages: Math.ceil(total / limit),
      },
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching price history:', error);
    return NextResponse.json(
      { error: 'Failed to fetch price history' },
      { status: 500 }
    );
  }
}
```

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ Servicio API para Historial

**Crear `frontend/lib/api/priceHistory.ts`:**

```typescript
import { PriceHistoryResponse, PriceHistoryFilters } from '@/types/priceHistory';

export async function fetchPriceHistory(filters?: PriceHistoryFilters): Promise<PriceHistoryResponse> {
  const params = new URLSearchParams();
  
  if (filters?.articleId) params.append('articleId', filters.articleId.toString());
  if (filters?.categoryId) params.append('categoryId', filters.categoryId.toString());
  if (filters?.changeType) params.append('changeType', filters.changeType);
  if (filters?.startDate) params.append('startDate', filters.startDate);
  if (filters?.endDate) params.append('endDate', filters.endDate);
  if (filters?.page) params.append('page', filters.page.toString());
  if (filters?.limit) params.append('limit', filters.limit.toString());

  const response = await fetch(`/api/price-history?${params.toString()}`, {
    method: 'GET',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    credentials: 'include',
  });

  if (!response.ok) {
    throw new Error('Failed to fetch price history');
  }

  return response.json();
}
```

```typescript
import { PriceHistoryFilters } from '@/types/priceHistory';
```

```diff
+ 
+     if (changeType) {
+       where.change_type = changeType;
+     }
+ 
+     if (startDate || endDate) {
+       where.created_at = {};
+       if (startDate) {
+         where.created_at.gte = new Date(startDate);
+       }
+       if (endDate) {
+         where.created_at.lte = new Date(endDate);
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     // Si hay filtro por categor√≠a, necesitamos join con articles
+     if (categoryId) {
+       where.articles = {
+         category_id: BigInt(categoryId),
+         deleted_at: null,
+       };
+     }
+ 
+     const [history, total] = await Promise.all([
+       prisma.price_history.findMany({
+         where,
+         include: {
+           articles: {
+             select: {
+               id: true,
+               code: true,
+               description: true,
+               category_id: true,
+             },
+           },
+         },
+         orderBy: {
+           created_at: 'desc',
+         },
+         skip,
+         take: limit,
+       }),
+       prisma.price_history.count({ where }),
+     ]);
+ 
+     const data = history.map(h =&gt; ({
+       id: Number(h.id),
+       articleId: Number(h.article_id),
+       articleCode: h.articles.code,
+       articleDescription: h.articles.description,
+       oldPrice: Number(h.old_price),
+       newPrice: Number(h.new_price),
+       changeType: h.change_type,
+       changedBy: h.changed_by || undefined,
+       changedByName: h.changed_by_name || undefined,
+       notes: h.notes || undefined,
+       createdAt: h.created_at.toISOString(),
+       priceChange: Number(h.new_price) - Number(h.old_price),
+       priceChangePercent: ((Number(h.new_price) - Number(h.old_price)) / Number(h.old_price)) * 100,
+     }));
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({
+       data,
+       pagination: {
+         page,
+         limit,
+         total,
+         totalPages: Math.ceil(total / limit),
+       },
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error fetching price history:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to fetch price history' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+ 
```

```diff
+ import { PriceHistoryResponse, PriceHistoryFilters } from '@/types/priceHistory';
+ 
+ export async function fetchPriceHistory(filters?: PriceHistoryFilters): Promise&lt;PriceHistoryResponse&gt; {
+   const params = new URLSearchParams();
+   
+   if (filters?.articleId) params.append('articleId', filters.articleId.toString());
+   if (filters?.categoryId) params.append('categoryId', filters.categoryId.toString());
+   if (filters?.changeType) params.append('changeType', filters.changeType);
+   if (filters?.startDate) params.append('startDate', filters.startDate);
+   if (filters?.endDate) params.append('endDate', filters.endDate);
+   if (filters?.page) params.append('page', filters.page.toString());
+   if (filters?.limit) params.append('limit', filters.limit.toString());
+ 
+   const response = await fetch(&#96;/api/price-history?${params.toString()}&#96;, {
+     method: 'GET',
+     headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
+     credentials: 'include',
+   });
+ 
+   if (!response.ok) {
+     throw new Error('Failed to fetch price history');
+   }
+ 
+   return response.json();
+ }
+
```

```diff
+ export function PriceImportDialog({ open, onOpenChange, onConfirm, articles }: PriceImportDialogProps) {
+   const [csvData, setCsvData] = useState&lt;ImportPreviewItem[]&gt;([]);
+   const [discountPercent, setDiscountPercent] = useState&lt;number&gt;(0);
+   const [isProcessing, setIsProcessing] = useState(false);
+ 
+   const handleFileUpload = (event: React.ChangeEvent&lt;HTMLInputElement&gt;) =&gt; {
+     const file = event.target.files?.[0];
+     if (!file) return;
+ 
+     const reader = new FileReader();
+     reader.onload = (e) =&gt; {
+       try {
+         const text = e.target?.result as string;
+         const lines = text.split('\n').filter(line =&gt; line.trim());
+         
+         if (lines.length &lt; 2) {
+           toast.error('El archivo CSV est√° vac√≠o o no tiene datos');
+           return;
+         }
+ 
+         // Skip header
+         const dataLines = lines.slice(1);
+         
+         const parsed: ImportPreviewItem[] = dataLines.map(line =&gt; {
+           const [code, priceStr] = line.split(',').map(s =&gt; s.trim());
+           const newPrice = parseFloat(priceStr);
+           
+           if (!code || isNaN(newPrice)) {
+             return null;
+           }
+ 
+           // Buscar art√≠culo por c√≥digo
+           const article = articles.find(a =&gt; a.code.toUpperCase() === code.toUpperCase());
+           
+           if (!article) {
+             return {
+               code,
+               newPrice,
+               adjustedPrice: newPrice,
+               status: 'not-found' as const,
+             };
+           }
+ 
+           const hasCost = article.costPrice &amp;&amp; article.costPrice &gt; 0;
+           const margin = hasCost 
+             ? ((newPrice - article.costPrice!) / newPrice) * 100 
+             : undefined;
+ 
+           return {
+             code,
+             articleId: article.id,
+             description: article.description,
+             currentPrice: article.unitPrice,
+             costPrice: article.costPrice,
+             newPrice,
+             adjustedPrice: newPrice,
+             margin,
+             status: hasCost ? 'found' as const : 'no-cost' as const,
+           };
+         }).filter(Boolean) as ImportPreviewItem[];
+ 
+         setCsvData(parsed);
+         toast.success(&#96;${parsed.length} precios cargados del CSV&#96;);
+       } catch (error) {
+         toast.error('Error al procesar el archivo CSV');
+         console.error(error);
+       }
+     };
+

+ 
+   const handleDiscountChange = (value: string) =&gt; {

+       const margin = item.costPrice &amp;&amp; item.costPrice &gt; 0
+         ? ((adjustedPrice - item.costPrice) / adjustedPrice) * 100
+         : undefined;

+       return {
```

## ‚úÖ Sistema de Descuentos Implementado

### **L√≥gica de Precios:**

1. **Nuevo Precio** - Precio del CSV sin descuentos
2. **Precio c/ Desc Categ** - Precio con descuento de la categor√≠a (en azul)
   - Muestra el % de descuento de la categor√≠a entre par√©ntesis
   - Ejemplo: `$5.94 (-30.0%)`
3. **Desc Adicional** - *(Solo si hay descuento manual)* Descuento adicional sobre el precio ya descontado (en naranja)
   - Muestra el % de descuento adicional
   - Ejemplo: `$5.35 (-10.0%)`
4. **Precio Final** - El precio que quedar√° en la DB (en azul primario)

### **Flujo de C√°lculo:**
```
CSV: $8.49
‚Üì (Descuento Categor√≠a: 30%)
Precio c/ Desc Categ: $5.94
‚Üì (Descuento Adicional Manual: 10%)
Desc Adicional: $5.35
‚Üì
Precio Final: $5.35 (este es el que se guarda)
```

### **Caracter√≠sticas:**
- ‚úÖ El descuento de categor√≠a viene de `categories.default_discount_percent`
- ‚úÖ Se aplica autom√°ticamente al cargar el CSV
- ‚úÖ El campo "Ajuste de Descuento (%)" aplica descuento **adicional** sobre el precio ya descontado
- ‚úÖ Los m√°rgenes se calculan con el precio final
- ‚úÖ Cada columna muestra claramente qu√© descuento se aplic√≥

Perfecto! Ahora el sistema est√° completo con el flujo de dos pasos:

## ‚úÖ Flujo de Importaci√≥n Implementado

### **Paso 1: Importar CSV**
1. Usuario hace clic en "Importar CSV"
2. Selecciona archivo y ajusta descuentos
3. Confirma en el di√°logo ‚Üí Los precios se **preparan** (no se guardan)
4. Aparece un **Alert azul** indicando cu√°ntos precios est√°n propuestos

### **Paso 2: Revisar y Confirmar**
5. En la tabla principal aparece la columna **"Nuevo Precio Propuesto"** (en azul)
   - Muestra el precio propuesto del CSV
   - Muestra el % de cambio respecto al actual (verde si sube, rojo si baja)
6. Usuario revisa los cambios en todas las categor√≠as
7. Hace clic en **"Confirmar Nuevos Precios"** ‚Üí Los precios se guardan en la DB y se registran en el historial

### **Caracter√≠sticas:**
- ‚úÖ Los precios propuestos se muestran en **azul** para diferenciarlos
- ‚úÖ Muestra el **porcentaje de cambio** para cada art√≠culo
- ‚úÖ Puede **cancelar** los precios propuestos en cualquier momento
- ‚úÖ Al confirmar, se guarda con `changeType: 'csv_import'` en el historial
- ‚úÖ Los precios propuestos persisten mientras navega por las categor√≠as
- ‚úÖ Alert azul prominente para recordar que hay cambios pendientes

### **Ejemplo Visual:**
```
Precio Unitario | Nuevo Precio Propuesto
$15.82          | $8.49 (-46.3%) ‚Üê en azul, con % en rojo
```

```diff
+ /**
+  * ============================================================================
+  * ORDENAMIENTO GLOBAL DE ART√çCULOS
+  * ============================================================================
+  * 
+  * Este m√≥dulo contiene las funciones de ordenamiento est√°ndar para art√≠culos.
+  * 
+  * ORDEN DE PRIORIDAD:
+  * 1. type       ‚Üí Alfab√©ticamente (Ciega ‚Üí Roscada ‚Üí SORF). Sin type va al final.
+  * 2. series     ‚Üí Num√©ricamente (150 ‚Üí 300 ‚Üí 600)
+  * 3. thickness  ‚Üí Num√©ricamente con parsing de fracciones (1/2 ‚Üí 3/4 ‚Üí 1)
+  * 4. size       ‚Üí Num√©ricamente con parsing de fracciones (1/2 ‚Üí 3/4 ‚Üí 1 ‚Üí 10)
+  * 
+  * NOTAS:
+  * - Los art√≠culos sin &#96;type&#96; van al final del listado
+  * - Soporta fracciones: "1/2", "3/4", "1 1/2" (fracciones mixtas)
+  * - Soporta decimales: "0.5", "1.5"
+  * - Soporta enteros: "1", "10", "24"

+  * ============================================================================

+ 
+ /**
+  * Interface m√≠nima requerida para ordenar art√≠culos
+  */
+ export interface SortableArticle {
+   type?: string | null;
+   series?: number | null;
+   thickness?: string | null;
+   size?: string | null;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Parsea valores de medida (fracciones, decimales, enteros) a n√∫mero decimal.
+  * 
+  * Ejemplos:
+  * - "1/2"    ‚Üí 0.5
+  * - "3/4"    ‚Üí 0.75
+  * - "1 1/2"  ‚Üí 1.5
+  * - "10"     ‚Üí 10
+  * - "0.5"    ‚Üí 0.5
+  * - undefined/null ‚Üí Infinity (va al final)
+  * 
+  * @param value - String con el valor a parsear
+  * @returns N√∫mero decimal para comparaci√≥n
+  */
+ export function parseToDecimal(value?: string | null): number {
+   if (!value) return Infinity; // Items sin valor van al final
+   
+   // Remover comillas y espacios
+   const cleaned = value.replace(/['"]/g, '').trim();
+   
+   // Intentar parsear como fracci√≥n (1/2, 3/4, etc.)
+   const fractionMatch = cleaned.match(/^(\d+)\/(\d+)$/);
+   if (fractionMatch) {
+     const numerator = parseInt(fractionMatch[1]);
+     const denominator = parseInt(fractionMatch[2]);
+     return numerator / denominator;
+   }
+   
+   // Intentar parsear como decimal o entero (0.5, 1.5, 10, etc.)
+   const decimalMatch = cleaned.match(/^(\d+\.?\d*)$/);
+   if (decimalMatch) {
+     return parseFloat(decimalMatch[1]);
+   }
+   
+   // Si contiene fracciones mixtas como "1 1/2"
+   const mixedMatch = cleaned.match(/^(\d+)\s+(\d+)\/(\d+)$/);
+   if (mixedMatch) {
+     const whole = parseInt(mixedMatch[1]);
+     const numerator = parseInt(mixedMatch[2]);
+     const denominator = parseInt(mixedMatch[3]);
+     return whole + numerator / denominator;
+   }
+   
+   // Si es texto puro, usar c√≥digo ASCII para ordenar alfab√©ticamente
+   return cleaned.charCodeAt(0) * 1000;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Compara dos art√≠culos para ordenamiento.
+  * 
+  * Orden de prioridad:
+  * 1. type (alfab√©tico, sin type al final)
+  * 2. series (num√©rico)
+  * 3. thickness (num√©rico/fraccional)
+  * 4. size (num√©rico/fraccional)
+  * 
+  * @param a - Primer art√≠culo
+  * @param b - Segundo art√≠culo
+  * @returns N√∫mero negativo si a &lt; b, positivo si a &gt; b, 0 si iguales
+  */
+ export function compareArticles&lt;T extends SortableArticle&gt;(a: T, b: T): number {
+   // 1. Ordenar por type (alfab√©ticamente, sin type va al final)
+   const typeA = a.type?.toLowerCase() || '';
+   const typeB = b.type?.toLowerCase() || '';
+   
+   // Items sin type van al final
+   if (!typeA &amp;&amp; typeB) return 1;
+   if (typeA &amp;&amp; !typeB) return -1;
+   
+   if (typeA !== typeB) {
+     return typeA.localeCompare(typeB);
+   }
+   
+   // 2. Ordenar por series (num√©rico)
+   const seriesA = a.series || 0;
+   const seriesB = b.series || 0;
+   if (seriesA !== seriesB) {
+     return seriesA - seriesB;
+   }
+   
+   // 3. Ordenar por thickness (fraccionario/num√©rico)
+   const thicknessA = parseToDecimal(a.thickness);
+   const thicknessB = parseToDecimal(b.thickness);
+   if (thicknessA !== thicknessB) {
+     return thicknessA - thicknessB;
+   }
+   
+   // 4. Ordenar por size (fraccionario/num√©rico)
+   const sizeA = parseToDecimal(a.size);
+   const sizeB = parseToDecimal(b.size);
+   return sizeA - sizeB;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Ordena un array de art√≠culos seg√∫n el orden est√°ndar.
+  * 
+  * @param articles - Array de art√≠culos a ordenar
+  * @returns Nuevo array ordenado (no modifica el original)
+  * 
+  * @example
+  * const items = [
+  *   { type: 'SORF', series: 150, size: '1"' },
+  *   { type: 'Ciega', series: 150, size: '1/2"' },
+  *   { type: 'Ciega', series: 300, size: '1/2"' },
+  * ];
+  * 
+  * const sorted = sortArticles(items);
+  * // Resultado:
+  * // 1. Ciega S-150 de 1/2"
+  * // 2. Ciega S-300 de 1/2"
+  * // 3. SORF S-150 de 1"
+  */
+ export function sortArticles&lt;T extends SortableArticle&gt;(articles: T[]): T[] {
+   return [...articles].sort(compareArticles);
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Ordena art√≠culos dentro de categor√≠as.
+  * √ötil para datos agrupados por categor√≠a.
+  * 
+  * @param categories - Array de categor√≠as con items
+  * @returns Nuevo array con items ordenados dentro de cada categor√≠a
+  * 
+  * @example
+  * const data = [
+  *   { categoryName: 'Bridas', items: [...] },
+  *   { categoryName: 'Accesorios', items: [...] },
+  * ];
+  * 
+  * const sorted = sortArticlesByCategory(data);
+  */
+ export function sortArticlesByCategory&lt;
+   T extends SortableArticle,
+   C extends { items: T[] }
+ &gt;(categories: C[]): C[] {
+   return categories.map(category =&gt; ({
+     ...category,
+     items: sortArticles(category.items),
+   }));
+ }
+
```

```diff
+ import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
+ import { requireAdmin } from '@/lib/auth/roles';
+ import { logActivity } from '@/lib/services/activityLog';
+ import { OPERATIONS } from '@/lib/constants/operations';
+ import { ChangeTracker } from '@/lib/services/changeTracker';
+ 
+ export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
+   try {
+     // Verificar permisos de administrador
+     const { authorized, error, user } = requireAdmin(request);
+     if (!authorized) {
+       return error || NextResponse.json({ error: 'Unauthorized' }, { status: 401 });
+     }
+ 
+     const body = await request.json();
+     const { priceHistoryId } = body;
+ 
+     if (!priceHistoryId) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'priceHistoryId is required' },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Obtener el registro de historial
+     const historyRecord = await prisma.price_history.findUnique({
+       where: { id: BigInt(priceHistoryId) },
+       include: {
+         articles: true,
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!historyRecord) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Price history record not found' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Verificar que el art√≠culo existe
+     if (!historyRecord.articles) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Article not found' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     const article = historyRecord.articles;
+     const currentPrice = Number(article.unit_price);
+     const revertToPrice = Number(historyRecord.old_price);
+ 
+     // Verificar que el precio actual es el que se cambi√≥ en ese historial
+     if (Math.abs(currentPrice - Number(historyRecord.new_price)) &gt; 0.01) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'El precio actual no coincide con el historial. Es posible que ya haya sido revertido o modificado.' },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Actualizar el precio del art√≠culo
+     const tracker = new ChangeTracker();
+     
+     await prisma.articles.update({
+       where: { id: article.id },
+       data: { 
+         unit_price: historyRecord.old_price,
+         updated_at: new Date(),
+         updated_by: user?.id,
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     tracker.trackChange(
+       'articles',
+       Number(article.id),
+       'unit_price',
+       currentPrice,
+       revertToPrice
+     );
+ 
+     // Crear nuevo registro en el historial indicando la reversi√≥n
+     await prisma.price_history.create({
+       data: {
+         article_id: article.id,
+         old_price: historyRecord.new_price,
+         new_price: historyRecord.old_price,
+         change_type: 'manual',
+         changed_by: user?.id,
+         changed_by_name: user?.name || user?.email,
+         notes: &#96;Reversi√≥n de cambio #${priceHistoryId} (${historyRecord.change_type})&#96;,
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     // Log de actividad
+     await logActivity({
+       operation: OPERATIONS.PRICE_UPDATE,
+       userId: user?.id,
+       userName: user?.name || user?.email,
+       description: &#96;Precio revertido para art√≠culo ${article.code}: $${currentPrice.toFixed(2)} ‚Üí $${revertToPrice.toFixed(2)}&#96;,
+       changes: tracker.getChanges(),
+       metadata: {
+         articleId: Number(article.id),
+         articleCode: article.code,
+         oldPrice: currentPrice,
+         newPrice: revertToPrice,
+         revertedFromHistoryId: priceHistoryId,
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json({
+       success: true,
+       message: 'Precio revertido exitosamente',
+       article: {
+         id: Number(article.id),
+         code: article.code,
+         oldPrice: currentPrice,
+         newPrice: revertToPrice,
+       },
+     });
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Error reverting price:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Failed to revert price' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ }
+
```

```diff
+ export function useRevertPrice() {
+   const queryClient = useQueryClient();
+ 
+   return useMutation({
+     mutationFn: async (priceHistoryId: number) =&gt; {
+       const response = await fetch('/api/price-lists/revert', {
+         method: 'POST',
+         headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
+         body: JSON.stringify({ priceHistoryId }),
+       });

+         const error = await response.json();
+         throw new Error(error.error || 'Error al revertir precio');
+       }
+ 
+       return response.json();
+     },
+     onSuccess: (data) =&gt; {
+       // Invalidar caches
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['price-lists'] });
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['articles'] });
+       queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: ['price-history'] });
+       
+       toast.success('Precio revertido exitosamente');
+     },
+     onError: (error: Error) =&gt; {
+       toast.error(error.message || 'Error al revertir precio');
+     },
+   });
+ }
```

## **Resumen de lo Implementado:**

### **1. Endpoint API `/api/price-lists/revert`**
- Verifica que el precio actual coincida con el historial
- Revierte el precio al valor anterior
- Crea un nuevo registro en el historial indicando la reversi√≥n
- Registra en el log de actividad

### **2. Hook `useRevertPrice()`**
- Mutation de React Query para revertir precios
- Invalida caches autom√°ticamente
- Muestra toast de √©xito/error

### **3. Bot√≥n de Reversi√≥n en Historial**
- Bot√≥n con icono `Undo2` en cada registro
- Confirmaci√≥n antes de revertir
- Estado de carga mientras procesa

### **4. Log de Actividad**
- Nueva operaci√≥n `PRICE_REVERT`
- Registra ambos cambios: aplicaci√≥n Y reversi√≥n
- Include metadata completa con IDs de historial

## **Flujo Completo:**

```
1. Usuario importa CSV con 444 precios
   ‚îú‚îÄ Crea 444 registros en price_history (change_type: csv_import)
   ‚îî‚îÄ Log: PRICE_BULK_UPDATE

2. Usuario confirma los precios
   ‚îú‚îÄ Actualiza unit_price en articles
   ‚îî‚îÄ Los cambios ya est√°n en price_history

3. Usuario abre "Ver Historial"
   ‚îú‚îÄ Ve tabla con todos los cambios
   ‚îî‚îÄ Cada fila tiene bot√≥n "Revertir" (√≠cono ‚ü≤)

4. Usuario hace clic en "Revertir"
   ‚îú‚îÄ Confirmaci√≥n: "¬øRevertir precio de BCS1501?"
   ‚îú‚îÄ API verifica que el precio actual coincide
   ‚îú‚îÄ Revierte: new_price ‚Üí old_price
   ‚îú‚îÄ Crea nuevo registro en price_history
   ‚îÇ   - old_price: el que ten√≠a
   ‚îÇ   - new_price: al que revierte
   ‚îÇ   - notes: "Reversi√≥n de cambio #123"
   ‚îî‚îÄ Log: PRICE_REVERT

5. En el log de actividad se ve:
   ‚îú‚îÄ 10:30 AM - PRICE_BULK_UPDATE (444 art√≠culos)
   ‚îî‚îÄ 11:45 AM - PRICE_REVERT (Art√≠culo BCS1501: $8.49 ‚Üí $15.82)
```

- ‚úÖ Solo administradores pueden revertir
- ‚úÖ Verifica que el precio actual coincida (evita reversiones err√≥neas)

```diff
+ import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import { prisma } from '@/lib/db';
+ import { requireAdmin } from '@/lib/auth/roles';
+ import { logActivity } from '@/lib/services/activityLog';
+ import { OPERATIONS } from '@/lib/constants/operations';
+ import { ChangeTracker } from '@/lib/services/changeTracker';
+ import { randomUUID } from 'crypto';
+ 
+ export async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
+   try {
+     // Verificar permisos de administrador
+     const { authorized, error, user } = requireAdmin(request);
+     if (!authorized) {
+       return error || NextResponse.json({ error: 'Unauthorized' }, { status: 401 });
+     }
+ 
+     // Obtener el √∫ltimo batch de cambios
+     const lastBatch = await prisma.price_history.findFirst({
+       where: {
+         change_batch_id: { not: null },
+       },
+       orderBy: { created_at: 'desc' },
+       select: { change_batch_id: true },
+     });
+ 
+     if (!lastBatch || !lastBatch.change_batch_id) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'No hay cambios recientes para revertir' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Obtener todos los cambios de ese batch
+     const batchChanges = await prisma.price_history.findMany({
+       where: { change_batch_id: lastBatch.change_batch_id },
+       include: { articles: true },
+       orderBy: { created_at: 'desc' },
+     });
+ 
+     if (batchChanges.length === 0) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'No se encontraron cambios en el batch' },
+         { status: 404 }
+       );
+     }
+

+       if (Math.abs(currentPrice - Number(change.new_price)) &gt; 0.01) {
```

```diff
+ // Verificar batch IDs en la base de datos
+ import { PrismaClient } from '@prisma/client';
+ 
+ const prisma = new PrismaClient();
+ 
+ async function main() {
+   try {
+     console.log('Analizando batch IDs en price_history...\n');
+     
+     // Obtener todos los batch IDs √∫nicos
+     const batchStats = await prisma.$queryRaw&#96;
+       SELECT 
+         change_batch_id,
+         COUNT(*) as items_count,
+         MIN(created_at) as first_change,
+         MAX(created_at) as last_change,
+         change_type,
+         changed_by_name
+       FROM price_history
+       WHERE change_batch_id IS NOT NULL
+       GROUP BY change_batch_id, change_type, changed_by_name
+       ORDER BY first_change DESC
+       LIMIT 20
+     &#96;;
+     
+     console.log('√öltimos 20 batch IDs:');
+     console.log('='.repeat(120));
+     
+     batchStats.forEach((batch: any, index: number) =&gt; {
+       console.log(&#96;\n${index + 1}. Batch ID: ${batch.change_batch_id.substring(0, 8)}...&#96;);
+       console.log(&#96;   Art√≠culos: ${batch.items_count}&#96;);
+       console.log(&#96;   Tipo: ${batch.change_type}&#96;);
+       console.log(&#96;   Usuario: ${batch.changed_by_name || 'N/A'}&#96;);
+       console.log(&#96;   Fecha: ${new Date(batch.first_change).toLocaleString()}&#96;);
+       
+       if (Number(batch.items_count) === 1) {
+         console.log('   ‚ö†Ô∏è  ALERTA: Solo 1 art√≠culo en este batch (deber√≠a ser m√∫ltiple para imports)');
+       }
+     });
+     
+     console.log('\n' + '='.repeat(120));
+     console.log('\nEstad√≠sticas generales:');
+     
+     const totalBatches = batchStats.length;
+     const singleItemBatches = batchStats.filter((b: any) =&gt; Number(b.items_count) === 1).length;
+     
+     console.log(&#96;Total de batches (√∫ltimos 20): ${totalBatches}&#96;);
+     console.log(&#96;Batches con 1 solo item: ${singleItemBatches}&#96;);
+     console.log(&#96;Batches con m√∫ltiples items: ${totalBatches - singleItemBatches}&#96;);
+     
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('‚ùå Error:', error);
+   } finally {
+     await prisma.$disconnect();
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ main();
+ 
```
